channel.title: CVE Feed for jose-lazo -- Delete Usermetas
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jose-lazo -- Delete Usermetas

item.title: CVE-2023-5537|2024-08-02T07:59:44.943Z -- jose-lazo -- delete%20usermetas
item.description: The Delete Usermeta plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.1.2. This is due to missing nonce validation on the delumet_options_page() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to remove user meta for arbitrary users via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
